MC2Itoa Namespace Reference

Functions for integers as string with bases up to and including 64. More...

Functions

  • MC2String toStr (uint32 nbr, int base, uint32 padToSize=uint32(0xffffffffU))
    Makes a string representation of the number in the selected base.
  • uint32 fromStr (const MC2String &str, int base)
    Make an integer from a number string.

Detailed Description

Functions for integers as string with bases up to and including 64.

Please note that bases 11-16 upper case, a-f, and that bases > 16 uses proprietary identifiers.

Function Documentation

int  base
) 
 

Make an integer from a number string.

Parameters:
str The string to convert.
base The base to use, valid values are 2-64.
Returns:
The number for the string.

int  base,
uint32  padToSize = uint32(0xffffffffU)
) 
 

Makes a string representation of the number in the selected base.

Parameters:
nbr The number to make a string of.
base The base to use, valid values are 2-64.
padToSize Left pad with zeros if result is smaller than this size.
Returns:
The string for the number.
